Iga warrior ?
=A0
=A0Do you mean a samurai from the Iga province ?
=A0He ac=
tually served in Owari/Mikawa ... if I am not mistaken (which I probably am=
 not 100% accurate)... but point is... he served Tokugawa.. which makes him=
 a "man from Iga"... but he is a "Tokugawa Retainer".
=A0
=A0=A0=A0 And tha=
nk you for not using the "n-word"... lol 
=A0
=A0How strong was he ... well=
, strong enough to write the Ninpiden.. but not strong enough to avoid inev=
itable death.
